message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, but I'm willing to let it go for $110. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at an excellent price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $110 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $90?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with $95. This allows us both to benefit with a fair deal.
